Question:

[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」

[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」

reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」

After that, the same exchange happened at the supermarket.  
I felt awkward and couldn't go to that shopping district for a while.  
...Well, if you say it's because of the cat's cuteness, then yes.

reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
**Shokora:** "I'll try to be a good girl!"

**Vanilla:** "Shigure, that's tough. But thanks to you, I've learned a lot."

**Master:** "Is that so? You have a wonderful master."

**Shokora:** "Ah, but Master is only for the master!"

**Shokora:** "Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?"

**Vanilla:** "Translated, it means Shigure is an important friend."

**Vanilla:** "Calling you 'Master' is just for this side's master."

**Master:** "Haha. You're loved a lot, aren't you, Master?"

**Kashou:** "Well, I'm grateful for that."

*Gets nudged gently with an elbow.*

*Responds with a shy smile and a slight grimace.*

...It's a bit embarrassing outside too.

[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」

**Supplier:** "If it's alright with you, we would like to hand over the ordered dishes..."

**Kashou:** "You want me to take the ordered ones?"

**Kashou:** "Huh? From this pile?"

A towering mountain of cardboard boxes.  
Words get stuck in his throat.  
They're all identical boxes after all.  
It's impossible to know what's inside until they're opened.  
Moreover, checking the labels shows that each one contains top-tier tea sets or dishes.  
So, handling them requires utmost care; otherwise, it could lead to disaster.

**Kashou:** "Well, I do have store opening preparations, so receiving these today would be nice..."

**Kashou:** "...But starting from now and doing all of this will take quite some time, right?"

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「形も揃って時間は容赦なく過ぎてくけど……」
今朝届いたばかりのショップカードに手を伸ばす。
[ショコラ]: 「にゃにゃにゃっ！？　ご主人さま、なんですか！　それはなんですかー！」
[バニラ]: 「おお。これはもしや、ショップカードというやつでは」
[ショコラ]: 「すごい、すごいですご主人さま！　お店の住所とか電話番号まで書いてますよー！」
[バニラ]: 「お店の情報がもろバレの一枚」
[バニラ]: 「個人情報保護にうるさい時代に危機感のない」
[嘉祥]: 「いやショップカードってそういうもんだから」
個人情報保護とか知ってるのにショップカードは知らないのか。
まぁ確かに変な営業とか来たら面倒だけども。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Time did fly by when we were trying to get everything prepared though...」
I reached for the business cards that had just arrived that morning.
[Chocola]: 「Meow meow meow?! Master, what are those?! Just what could those be?」
[Vanilla]: 「Ohh. Could those be those things called "business cards?"」
[Chocola]: 「Amazing! That's amazing, Master! It even has the shop's address and phone number on it!」
[Vanilla]: 「It's a single card that tells you everything about this shop.」
[Vanilla]: 「You have no sense of discretion in an era where everyone is protective of their privacy.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's exactly what business cards are used for.」
She knew about protecting personal information, but not about business cards...?
Well, it was true that it would be a pain if I was in some sort of strange business or something.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "The shape is complete, and time passes without mercy..."

He reaches for the shop card that arrived this morning.

Chocola: "Nyanyanya! Master, what's this? What is it?"

Vanilla: "Ah. This must be what they call a shop card."

Chocola: "Amazing, amazing, Master! It even has the store address and phone number!"

Vanilla: "A slip-up revealing all the store information."

Vanilla: "Lacking concern for privacy in an age where personal data protection is paramount."

Kashou: "Well, that's just what a shop card is."

Knowing about personal information protection but not knowing about shop cards. Sure, it would be troublesome if some strange salespeople came by, though.

[Kashou]: 「... You two really are cats.」
That was how I felt, watching those two get so engrossed in a regular cat toy.
Well, it did say "Go Ahead," so for now, I'll just let them play with it.
[Kashou]: 「Hmm, where can I find books on catgirls...」
As I looked around the store, an apron-clad shop clerk came up to me.
[Shop Clerk]: 「Is there anything I can help you with?」
[Kashou]: 「Do you have any books on raising cats? The humanoid kind.」
[Shop Clerk]: 「Yes, certainly! They would be over here.」
[Kashou]: 「... Wow, there sure are a lot of books on catgirls.」

Chocola & Vanilla: "Nyan-nyan! Nya nya nya nya nya-!! (Pashitt, pashitt)"

Kashou: "……They really are cats."

Looking at the two of them engrossed in ordinary cat toys, he feels it.

Well, since it says 'please feel free,' I'll just leave them for now.

As he looks around the store, a shop attendant approaches him wearing an apron.

Kashou: "Do you have any books on how to take care of cats? Like human-shaped ones."

Kashou: "……There are quite a few cat books, aren't there?"

Question:

シナモンとココナツにも頭を下げる。
こうやって実家のネコが全員来てくれて。
今は本当に家族の暖かみがありがたく思える。
[時雨]: 「お父さまの耳には入らないようにしておきますので、ご安心下さい」

[時雨]: 「私はいつでも兄さまを見て来ましたし、これからも応援していますから」
小さな両手で俺の手をそっと包んでくれる。
黙って出て行ったことなど一言も口にしないまま。
ただ許してくれるように。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Cinnamon, Coconut, I'm sorry to have worried you guys, too.」
[Kashou]: 「It won't happen again, so please cut me some slack.」
I lowered my head towards Cinnamon and Coconut.
And just like that, all the catgirls in my family were assembled.
I appreciated the warmth of having my family here right now.
[Shigure]: 「I won't let Father know about this, so please don't worry.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, I appreciate it. You've been through a lot, too. Sorry.」
[Shigure]: 「It was nothing.」
[Shigure]: 「I will always come and visit you, Nii-sama. I'll be cheering you on.」
She wrapped her small hands around my hand.
She didn't say anything about me slipping out without telling anyone.
She simply just forgave me.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Shinamon and Coconut, I'm sorry for causing you unnecessary worry."

Kashou: "I won't do this again in the future, so please forgive me."

He bows to Shinamon and Coconut.

Having all of my family cats come here like this...

Right now, I truly feel grateful for the warmth of being a family.

Shigure: "I'll make sure it doesn't reach father's ears, so please be at ease."

Kashou: "Ah, I'm counting on you. I've been causing you all sorts of troubles and I apologize."

Shigure: "That's nothing."

Shigure: "I've always watched over you, brother-sama, and will continue to support you."

She gently wraps my hand with her small hands.

Without saying a word about leaving quietly...

Just asking for forgiveness.

Question:

ネコに反抗期があるのか知らないけど。
[嘉祥]: 「とりあえず今日の分の売上集計は、と」
バニラは気にせずにレジに向かう。
[バニラ]: 「…………（ぴとっ）」
[嘉祥]: 「…………ん？」
[バニラ]: 「くんくん、くんくんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「すーはぁ～……すぅぅーはぁぁ～……♪」
[嘉祥]: 「…………あの、バニラさん？」
[バニラ]: 「んん～？　んんん～～？」
[バニラ]: 「にゃっ！？　にゃにゃにゃっ！？」

[嘉祥]: 「バニラがくっついて来たんだろーが」

reference_answer:
Was this some sort of new rebellious phase of hers?
I'm not sure catgirls even have rebellious phases, though.
[Kashou]: 「Anyways, the total sales for today is...」
Vanilla headed towards the register, paying me no heed.
[Vanilla]: 「...... Fwiph.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Hm?」
[Vanilla]: 「Sniff sniff, sniff sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Huff, puff~ Huff... puff~ ♪」
[Kashou]: 「...... Uhm, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm~? Hmmmm~?」
[Vanilla]: 「Meow?! Meow meow meow?!」
[Vanilla]: 「Master, why are you pushing your back against me?」
[Kashou]: 「Wait, wait, wait.」
[Kashou]: 「You're the one who's pressed against me.」
[Vanilla]: 「... I am? Against Master?」
ModelAnswer:
This must be some new kind of rebellion or something. I don't know if cats even have a rebellious phase.

[Kashou]: "Well, let's start with today's sales tally."

Vanilla heads to the register without paying any attention.

[Vanilla]: "(pito)"

[Kashou]: "(n?)"

[Vanilla]: "Kun kun, kun kun kun..."

[Vanilla]: "Suuhaa... suuuhaa... ♪"

[Kashou]: "(...) Ahem, Vanilla-san?"

[Vanilla]: "Nn? Nnn~?"

[Vanilla]: "Nyaa!? Nyanya nya!?"

[Vanilla]: "Master, why are you pushing your back against me?"

[Kashou]: "No way no way no way."

[Kashou]: "You came up to me, didn't ya, Vanilla!"

[Vanilla]: "... Me? To Master?"

Question:
目の前の二匹に目を奪われてしまう。
[ショコラ]: 「んふふ♪　いつからこんなにしてたの？」
[ショコラ]: 「こんなにしたままで、澄まし顔でお店に立ってたのかにゃ？」
[バニラ]: 「そ、そんなことにゃ……！　あ、んあぁっ……！　は、にゃぁぁ……！！」
[バニラ]: 「はぁ、はぁぁ……！　ほんとに、もうやめ……！　んんぅっ……！」
[ショコラ]: 「バニラが嘘つくからでしょ？」
[ショコラ]: 「ホントのこと言わないと止めてあげないんだから……♪」
[バニラ]: 「ほ、ほんとのことって……」
[バニラ]: 「……ご主人」
助けを求めるように視線を向けて来る。
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまに助けを求めちゃだーめ」
[ショコラ]: 「ほら。素直に言わないと、バニラもつらいでしょ？」
reference_answer:
... as I was entranced by the two catgirls in front of my eyes.
[Chocola]: 「Mufufu~ ♪ How long have you been holding out for?」
[Chocola]: 「You were working in the store with such a demure face while you were like this the whole time, meow?」
[Vanilla]: 「Th-That's not true...! Ah, muah...! Hah, meow...!」
[Vanilla]: 「Hah, haah...! I really can't... take it anymore...! Mmhh...!」
[Chocola]: 「That's because you're lying, isn't it, Vanilla?」
[Chocola]: 「Unless you tell the truth, Chocola isn't going to stop~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「I-I'm telling you, it's true...」
[Vanilla]: 「... Master.」
She looked over at me, hoping I'd cut in and rescue her.
[Chocola]: 「You can't ask Master to save youuu~」
[Chocola]: 「Come on~ Lying will just make it worse for you, right?」
ModelAnswer:
The eyes are captivated by the two in front.

Chocola: "Nnufu♪ When did you start doing this?"

Chocola: "Were you standing at the shop like that with a straight face all along, nya?"

Vanilla: "S, sonyan thing...! A, nnahhh...! H, nyaaa...!!"

Vanilla: "Haa, haaaa...! Really, stop already...! Nnngg..."

Chocola: "Because Vanilla is lying."

Chocola: "I won't stop unless you tell the truth...♪"

Vanilla: "What's the real thing?"

Vanilla: "...Master."

She looks at me as if asking for help.

Chocola: "You can't ask Master-sama for help."

Chocola: "Look. If you don't say it straight, Vanilla will be in trouble too."

Question:
[時雨]: 「現に家のネコたちは元気にやっております」
[時雨]: 「多少は運動などで発散はさせていますけども」
[嘉祥]: 「……そう言われてみれば、確かにそんな気も」
家でそんな現場を見たこともないし。
いや女の時雨がそもそもどうこうできるものでもないし……。
[嘉祥]: 「でもバニラがそう言ってたぞ」
[嘉祥]: 「なぁバニラ？」
[バニラ]: 「時雨が、ご主人を説得するにはそう言えばいいってくあぁ～……」
[ショコラ]: 「あ～そういえば、そんなこと言ってたねぇくあぁぁ～……」
[嘉祥]: 「教えこんだのはお前じゃねーか」
[時雨]: 「そんなことより兄さま。今日もこの妹めに愛のささやきを」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「The catgirls at home are doing just fine, you know.」
[Shigure]: 「I'm having them do a bit of exercise to work off the effects of being in heat, though.」
[Kashou]: 「... Come to think of it, I seem to remember seeing that before.」
I hadn't ever seen them doing "stuff" in the house.
No, being female, there was no way for Shigure to do that with them...
[Kashou]: 「... But Vanilla told me they'd get sick from being in heat.」
[Kashou]: 「Right, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure said that I should explain it to Master like that, yawn~」
[Chocola]: 「Ah~ Come to think of it, Chocola remembers being told something like that yawnnn~」
[Kashou]: 「... So you're the one who told them.」
[Shigure]: 「More importantly, Nii-sama. Whisper today's sweet nothings to your little sister~」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "The cats at home are doing fine."

Shigure: "I do let them out for some exercise and such, though."

Kashou: "...When you put it that way, I suppose so."

I've never seen anything like that happen at home.  
And anyway, Shigure being a woman can't really do much about it...  

Kashou: "But Vanilla said something like that."

Kashou: "Hey, Vanilla?"

Vanilla: "Shigure says to say this to convince Master—kuaaa..."

Chocola: "Ah, now that you mention it, she did say something like that—kuuuaaaa..."

Kashou: "You're the one who taught her."

Shigure: "Besides all that, Brother. Today too, whisper some love into your little sister's ear."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「まるで前はキスしてたみたいな言い方すんな」
腰に手を当てて頬を膨らませる時雨。
ほんとこいつの冗談はわかりづらい。
兄として外に出すのが心配になるレベルだ。
可愛い妹であるのは認めるが故に。
[時雨]: 「でもショコラもバニラも幸せそうで良かったです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまのところに来ることで鈴も持てましたし」
[時雨]: 「それに、ちゃんと心の方も成長しているようですしね？」
寝ぼけながらお互いの髪を梳かしている二匹。
時雨が愛しい我が子を見るように優しく目を細める。
[時雨]: 「ちょっと前までは、あんな風に身だしなみを気にしたりもしなかったのですが」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Don't say that and make it sound like we've kissed before.」
Shigure put her hands on her hips and puffed out her cheeks.
It was really hard to get her jokes.
Sometimes, as her older brother, I wondered if it's really safe for her to go outside on her own.
Even more so because she's a heck of a cute little sister.
[Shigure]: 「I am glad that both Chocola and Vanilla are happy now, though.」
[Shigure]: 「They were able to get their Bells by going with Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「It also seems like they've experienced love a bit as well, doesn't it?」
The two catgirls' combed each other's hair, still half-asleep.
Shigure gazed at them as if they were her very own lovely children.
[Shigure]: 「Not too long ago, they didn't even seem to care much about personal grooming like that, either.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Don't talk like you were kissing me before."

Shigure places her hand on her hip and puffs up her cheeks. Truly, his jokes are hard to understand. It's gotten to the point where I'm worried about letting him out as my brother. Because I acknowledge that she is a cute little sister.

Shigure: "But it was good to see both Chocola and Vanilla look happy."

Shigure: "They were able to get the bell after coming here with Master."

Shigure: "And, they seem to be growing in their hearts as well?"

The two pets are combing each other's hair while half-asleep. Shigure gently narrows her eyes, looking at them like she adores her own children.

Shigure: "Not too long ago, they didn't even care about grooming themselves."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「時雨は本気ですからね？　兄さまのためでしたら何でもするのですから」
[嘉祥]: 「はいはい、分かった分かった。ありがとな、うりうり」
[時雨]: 「もー兄さまー！　くしゃくしゃしちゃダメですってばぁー！」
せっせと手櫛で乱れた髪を直す。
うん。相変わらず可愛い妹だ。
[時雨]: 「でも、兄さまも雰囲気がとても優しくなりました」
[時雨]: 「やはり家を出て良かったのでしょうね」
[時雨]: 「……時雨は、少しだけ寂しく思いますが」
少しだけトーンの落ちた声で。
寂しそうに、困ったように微笑む。
[嘉祥]: 「……時雨には、昔から色々と迷惑かけてたからな」
俺と父親の折り合いが上手く行かなかった時も。
俺が洋菓子を隠れて練習してた時も。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I'm serious, you know? I'll do whatever I can for Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, yeah. I get it, I get it. Thanks. Take this and that, too!」
[Shigure]: 「Geez, Nii-sama! No messing up my hair!」
She fixed her hair by patting it down.
Yep. She was the same old cute little sister.
[Shigure]: 「But you do seem to have become kinder too, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「It probably was a good thing for you to leave the house.」
[Shigure]: 「... I do feel a bit lonely, though.」
With a slightly lower tone in her voice...
... she smiled a somewhat sad and troubled smile.
[Kashou]: 「... I've caused a lot of problems for you in the past.」
When I wasn't able to get along with Dad.
When I'd practice my baking in secret.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure: "I'm serious, so if it's for your sake, I'll do anything."

Minaduki Kashou: "Yeah yeah, got it, got it. Thanks a lot, urururu."

Shigure: "Ah, Master! Don't mess up my hair like that!"

She busily combs her tangled hair.

Hmm. My little sister is as cute as ever.

Shigure: "But you've become so much gentler in your manner."

Shigure: "I guess it was for the best to leave home."

Shigure: "... I feel a bit lonely, though."

In a slightly lower tone.

She smiles wistfully and with a look of concern.

Kashou: ".... After all, I've been troubling you since long ago."

When my relationship with our father wasn't going well.

Even when I was secretly practicing making Western sweets.

[嘉祥]: 「ちょっと……休ませて下さい、ほんと……まじで……」
ふらふらとベンチに腰を降ろしてグロッキー。
遊園地がこんなにドギついものだったとは……。
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さま、せっかくのデートなのに情けないですよー？」
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「Also, they might lose more than just their pride as a catgirl...!」
[Kashou]: 「Hold on! There's an emergency exit over there! Hold on until then!!」
[Vanilla]: 「Tell Shigure... I went out like a true catgirl...! Urk!!」
[Kashou]: 「What was that "urk" just now!? Don't give up!! Hey, Vanilla!!」
[Chocola]: 「Myah! Myah! Master! That there! Let's ride that spinning one there next!!」
[Vanilla]: 「Myaoh, myaoh. Enough of those fast ones. Let's do the dropping one again.」
[Kashou]: 「Wait... Let me rest, really... seriously...」
Light-headed, I sat on the bench feeling groggy.
To think amusement parks could pack this much punch...
[Chocola]: 「We're finally on a date, but you're really kind of a let-down, Master.」
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "There's also the dignity of a cat and other things that might be exposed...!"

Kashou: "Wait! There's an emergency exit over there! Hold on until then!!"

Vanilla: "I want to remain a brave cat until the end... Shigure..."

Kashou: "What was that 'u'!? Don't give up like that!! Hey, Vanilla!!"

Chocola: "Nya-! Nya-! Master! Next time, let's ride that spinning thing again!!"

Vanilla: "Nya- nya-. That super fast one is also good. Let's try falling again."

Kashou: "Um... Please give me a break, really... seriously..."

Faintly swaying, he sits down on the bench and collapses.

I didn't expect the amusement park to be this doki doki...

Chocola: "Master, isn't it pitiful that you're like this on our date?"

Question:

[時雨]: 「兄さまの様子がおかしいと、飛んで来てみれば」
[時雨]: 「まったくもう、何をやっているのですか兄さまは……」
ベッドの横に座った時雨が盛大な溜息を吐く。
[ショコラ]: 「かろーってなんですか？」
[時雨]: 「正式にはいわゆる慢性疲労と言われるものです」
[時雨]: 「簡単に言えば身体が疲れすぎてる状態ですね」
[バニラ]: 「昨日までは元気だったけど……」
[時雨]: 「疲れ過ぎると逆に疲労の度合いも分からなくなるそうです」
[ショコラ]: 「……疲れすぎると逆に元気になるってこと？」
[バニラ]: 「それって……」
[ショコラ]: 「…………ぽっ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「... It's from overwork. For now, you need to let your body rest.」
[Shigure]: 「When you said Nii-sama seemed odd, I flew over here to see what was the matter.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, Nii-sama, just what am I supposed to do with you, for heaven's sake?」
Sitting next to the bed, Shigure let out a big sigh.
[Chocola]: 「Overwork? What's that?」
[Shigure]: 「More formally, it's called "chronic fatigue," but...」
[Shigure]: 「... to put it simply, it's what happens when your body is too tired.」
[Vanilla]: 「But he was so energetic up until yesterday...」
[Shigure]: 「When you become overtired, you can actually stop noticing how exhausted you are.」
[Chocola]: 「... You mean if you get too tired, you become energetic?」
[Vanilla]: 「Then...」
[Chocola]: 「...... Blush~」
ModelAnswer:
SHIGURE: "……You're overworked. You need to rest and let your body recover first."

SHIGURE: "I came running because I noticed something was off with brother-sama."

SHIGURE: "Honestly, what is brother-sama doing now…"

Shigure sits by the side of the bed and lets out a big sigh.

CHOCOLA: "What's 'karo'?"

SHIGURE: "Formally, it's called chronic fatigue syndrome."

SHIGURE: "In simple terms, it means your body is overly tired."

VANILLA: "He was fine until yesterday…"

SHIGURE: "They say when you're too exhausted, you can't even gauge the level of your fatigue."

CHOCOLA: "……So being too tired makes you energetic?"

VANILLA: "That's like saying…"

CHOCOLA: "…………poo."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……疲れすぎると自分でも気づかないって、さっき時雨が言ってたろ？」
[時雨]: 「そうなる前に気付いてたはずです。はぐらかさないで下さい」
姿勢を正して、真面目な顔で俺にじっと視線を注ぐ。
空白の時間が流れても、身じろぎひとつせずに俺を見ていた。
その様子に根負けして、溜息を零して降参する。
[嘉祥]: 「……俺が頑張らなくちゃ、と思ったからだよ」
枕に頭を預けると天井に向けて呟く。
[嘉祥]: 「この間、ショコラとバニラとデートしてさ」
[嘉祥]: 「その時に思ったんだよ」
[嘉祥]: 「もうただのペットじゃなくて、家族で、恋人だって」
[嘉祥]: 「だから、俺が勝手に出てきたことで、あいつらにあんまり苦労かけたくないんだよ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... You said it yourself that if you get too tired, you don't notice it, right?」
[Shigure]: 「You should have noticed before that. Don't try to evade the question.」
She sat up straight and stared at me intensely.
We waited in silence for a while, yet she still stared at me without budging an inch.
Seeing her persistence, I decided to give in and surrendered with a sigh.
[Kashou]: 「... It's because I thought that I had to work harder.」
I murmured, leaning my head back on the pillow and looking at the ceiling.
[Kashou]: 「Recently, I went on a date with Chocola and Vanilla...」
[Kashou]: 「... It was then that it struck me.」
[Kashou]: 「That they're not just pets, but family. Lovers, even.」
[Kashou]: 「So I didn't want them to have to work hard because of my choice to leave home.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "……Shigure said just now that you don't realize it when you're too tired, right?"

Shigure: "I should have noticed before it got to that point. Please don't evade the issue."

She straightens her posture and fixes a serious gaze on me.

Time passes in silence, but she doesn't move an inch from staring at me.

Defeated by her demeanor, I sigh and surrender.

Kashou: "……It's because I thought I had to try harder."

I rest my head on the pillow and mutter towards the ceiling.

Kashou: "The other day, I went out with Chocola and Vanilla."

Kashou: "That's when I realized something."

Kashou: "They're not just pets anymore; they're family, even like a lover."

Kashou: "So, I don't want to burden them too much by leaving on my own accord."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「時雨のお陰様で、予想以上に客足が伸びたこともあるけどな」
[時雨]: 「あら何のことでしょう？」
俺がそれ以上は追求しないことにすると、
時雨も小さく笑って首を傾げて応える。
素直に答えるくらいなら直接言ってるだろうし。
そんなところも昔からの時雨らしさだ。
[時雨]: 「兄さまの仰ることも分かりますが」
[時雨]: 「でもネコは賢い子たちですから。人間の家族にも、パートナーにもなれるくらいに」
[時雨]: 「……だからこそ」
そこで一呼吸を置いて。
困ったような笑顔を浮かべて俺を見る。
[時雨]: 「……自分にも頼ってもらえないのは、きっと寂しいことだと思いますよ？」
その笑顔に胸がズキリと痛む。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well, it's your own fault our clientele increased so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh? Just what might you be talking about?」
I decided not to press further.
Shigure smiled slightly and tilted her head in response.
If she was going to address that issue honestly, she would already have done so by now.
That's how Shigure had always been.
[Shigure]: 「I understand what you are saying, Nii-sama...」
[Shigure]: 「... but catgirls are clever. Clever enough to become family, and even lovers, to humans.」
[Shigure]: 「... And that's exactly why.」
She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Thanks to Shigure, we've had more customers than expected."

Shigure: "Oh, what do you mean?"

I decide not to pursue it further, and Shigure responds with a small smile and a tilted head. She would answer directly if she were going to be straightforward. That's just like her.

Shigure: "I understand what my brother says, but..."

Shigure: "But cats are smart children. They can become part of human families or partners."

Shigure: "...That's why..."

After pausing for a moment, Shigure looks at me with a troubled smile.

Shigure: "...Don't you think it must be lonely not to have people rely on you?"

Her smile makes my chest ache sharply.

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
携帯の画面を見て眉根を寄せる。
そのまま動かない時雨を見て着信元を察する。
[嘉祥]: 「実家からだろ？　早く出ないと」
[時雨]: 「……用件など出ずとも分かります。行き先を告げずに出て来たので」
時雨の手の中の携帯が鳴り止む。
同じように時雨も黙ったまま、
携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。
[時雨]: 「……私がまだ年端もいかぬ女だからですか？」
[時雨]: 「それとも、世間知らずの子どもだからですか？」
[時雨]: 「……だから、私はお父さまとお母さまの言うことに従わねばならないのでしょうか」
[時雨]: 「……私は、ここにいたいのです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまが苦しまれてる時くらい……せめて、お傍にいるだけでも……」
reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure frowns at her phone screen.  
Without moving, she looks at Kashou and guesses the caller's identity.  

[Kashou]: "It’s from your parents’ house, isn’t it? You should go soon."  

[Shigure]: "...Even without details, I understand what they want. They sent me here without telling me where to go."  

Her phone stops ringing.  
In silence, Shigure clutches her phone tightly.  

[Shigure]: "...Is that because I'm still a young girl?"  

[Shigure]: "Or is it because I don't know the world?"  

[Shigure]: "...Does that mean I have to obey what Father and Mother say?"  

[Shigure]: "...I want to stay here."  

[Shigure]: "Even if it's just when you're suffering, at least... being by your side..."

Question:
[バニラ]: 「他の病院の場所は知らないし……道を聞ける人も、歩いてない……」
[バニラ]: 「でも、このまま帰るわけにも行かないし……どうしたら……」
不安でぎゅっと手を握り合う。
冷たいシャッターを見上げて下唇をきゅっと噛む。
[警察]: 「キミたち、何してるの？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ……警察さん！」
[ショコラ]: 「開いてる病院教えてもらえませんか！？」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまが大変で！　それで、お医者さん呼ぼうと思って！」
[バニラ]: 「病院が休みで、どうすればいいか分からなくて……」
[警察]: 「飼い主さんが？　それは大変だけど……」
[警察]: 「キミたち鈴は？　持ってないの？」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「あっ……！」
指摘されて首元に手を当てる。
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「We don't know any other clinics... and there aren't any people on the street to ask.」
[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.
Looking up at the cold shutters, we chewed our lips in concern.
[Police Officer]: 「What are you two doing there?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah... Ms. Policewoman!」
[Chocola]: 「Where's the closest open clinic?!」
[Chocola]: 「Master is in trouble, so we wanted to get a doctor!」
[Vanilla]: 「The clinic is closed and we don't know what to do...」
[Police Officer]: 「Your Master is? That's a quite a problem, but...」
[Police Officer]: 「Where are your Bells? Don't you have them?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」
We touched our necks where she pointed.
ModelAnswer:
VANILLA: "I don't know where the other hospitals are, and there's no one around to ask for directions..."

VANILLA: "But I can't just go back like this... What should we do?"

They clasp hands tightly out of anxiety.

Looking up at the cold shutter, they bite their lower lip.

POLICE OFFICER: "What are you two doing?"

CHOCOLA: "Ah... police officer!"

CHOCOLA: "Could you tell us where an open hospital is? Please! My master is in trouble, and I was trying to call a doctor!"

VANILLA: "The hospitals are closed, and we don't know what to do..."

POLICE OFFICER: "Your owner? That's serious... But..."

POLICE OFFICER: "Do you have your bell? Aren't you wearing it?"

CHOCOLA & VANILLA: "Ah...!"

Upon being pointed out, they touch their necks.

Question:
朝イチから予想外の光景に頭がついて来てくれない。
[時雨]: 「おはようございます、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「私は今回の一件で色々と考えたのです」
晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。
他のネコたちも同じように笑顔を俺に向けている。
つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ」
reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
The unexpected scene from the start of the day is too much for my head to keep up with.

Shigure: "Good morning, older brother."

Shigure: "I've been thinking a lot about this incident."

A bright and cloudless smile.

The other cats are also smiling at me.

Tsuu, I feel cold sweat spreading.

Kashou: "Haa... Thinking about what?"

I manage to say just that much.

Shigure: "This time, it became very clear how unreasonable it is for you not to overwork yourself."

Shigure: "However, the fact remains that as a younger sister, I've also been worried sick enough to lose sleep..."

Shigure: "So, I thought the best strategy would be to increase our staff and reduce your burden."

Kashou: "…………Haa."

Ore wa katte kimatte moratta kan koohii o uketotta.

Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
I have a request for one of my suppliers. It's not urgent, but it would be better to call them sooner rather than later.

For a privately-run patisserie like this, I think it's normal. But I personally negotiate with each supplier myself.

If you order in bulk, there are farms that will sell ingredients that aren't generally distributed.

The exploration of flavors is also a journey to find new ingredients.

Since everyone else is busy with tourism, it would be tacky to talk about work then. So, I said I had personal business and left the room.

Just to be safe, I stepped out of the inn and decided to speak in a quiet place.

I made the call.

Kashou: "Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?"

Kashou: "Fuu..."

They were surprised that it was an order from abroad, but they seemed willing to ship it after all.

I returned to the inn.

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「シナモンが呼んでるとか、嘘じゃない！」
これがバニラの本気か。恐ろしい。
[バニラ]: 「ふぅ……負けを認めないとは」
[メイプル]: 「フキーッ！？」
[嘉祥]: 「は、はは……まぁ、ほどほどに、仲良くな？」
俺は卓球台から離れ、別の場所へ向かった。
ゲームコーナーで、アズキとシナモンを見つけた。この２匹の組み合わせも、けっこう珍しい気がする。
[シナモン]: 「わうっ！　ひゃうっ！？　あっ、あっ！　やっ！」
アズキは黙々と操作し、その後ろで見ているだけのシナモンが、身体を左右に揺らしつつ、奇妙な声をあげていた。
[シナモン]: 「あっ、だめ！　はうっ……あっ、んんっ、きゃふっ！？」
[嘉祥]: 「なにやってるんだ？」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「You lied by telling me Cinnamon was calling!」
So this is how Vanilla plays 'for real', huh? Scary stuff.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmph... You're a sore loser.」
[Maple]: 「Arghhh!!」
[Kashou]: 「H-Hahah... Now there, let's try to get along, okay?」
I leave the ping-pong table and head someplace else.
I find Azuki and Cinnamon in the game corner. I feel like seeing these two together is pretty rare, too.
[Cinnamon]: 「Waah! Haah-ngh! Ah, aah! Yah!!」
Azuki is playing silently while Cinnamon is watching from behind, rocking her body from side to side and letting out bizarre yelps.
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah! Don't! Ha-ngh... Ah! Mm! Kya-fhh?!」
[Kashou]: 「What are you doing?」
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "Cinnamon is calling! That's not a lie!"

This is Vanilla for real. Terrifying.

Vanilla: "Phew... You won't admit defeat, huh?"

Maple: "Fuki-eeek!?"

Kashou: "Hahahaha... Well then, let's be friends to some extent."

I left the ping pong table and headed elsewhere.

In the game corner, I found Azuki and Cinnamon. This pair seems quite unusual too.

Cinnamon: "Wau! Hyau!? Ah, ah! Ya!"

Azuki is quietly playing, while Cinnamon watches from behind, swaying her body side to side and making strange noises.

Cinnamon: "Ah, no! Hau... Ah, nnn! Kyafu!?"

Kashou: "What are you doing?"

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「はむはむ……おまんじゅう、おーいしー」
[ココナツ]: 「もぐもぐ……これが、伝説の温泉まんじゅうなんだね！」
[ショコラ]: 「甘い。おいしい。甘い」
[ココナツ]: 「なるほど……これは……最高に美味しい！」
[嘉祥]: 「おいおい……」
[ショコラ]: 「あっ、ご主人さま！」
[ココナツ]: 「お兄ちゃん！」
[ショコラ]: 「もう用事はいいんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、終わったよ」
[嘉祥]: 「こんな時間にまんじゅうを食べてたら、夕飯が入らなくなるぞ？」
[ショコラ]: 「うっ……！！」
[ココナツ]: 「それは、その……」
[ショコラ]: 「実は、やむににゃまれぬ深い理由がありまして……」
[嘉祥]: 「ほう？」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「Om, om... Manju buns are so yummy!」
[Coconut]: 「Omf, omf... So these are the legendary hot-spring manju buns!」
[Chocola]: 「So sweet. So yummy. So sweet.」
[Coconut]: 「I see... This is the best!」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, hey...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, Master!」
[Coconut]: 「Onii-chan!」
[Chocola]: 「Are you done with your business?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm all done.」
[Kashou]: 「You know, if you eat manju now, you're not going to have room for dinner.」
[Chocola]: 「Urk...!」
[Coconut]: 「Well, you see...」
[Chocola]: 「There is a deep and catpelling reason for all this...」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, which is?」
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "Humph, humph... The manju is so delicious!"

Coconut: "Mogu mogu... This is the legendary onsen manju, huh!"

Chocola: "Sweet. Delicious. Sweet."

Coconut: "I see... This is absolutely delicious!"

Kashou: "Hey hey..."

Chocola: "Ah, Master-sama!"

Coconut: "Big brother!"

Chocola: "Is your business over now?"

Kashou: "Yeah, it's done."

Kashou: "If you eat manju at this time, there won't be room for dinner, will there?"

Chocola: "Uh...!!"

Coconut: "Well, that is..."

Chocola: "Actually, there is an unavoidable deep reason..."

Kashou: "Huh?"

metadata:

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「うむ」
[ショコラ]: 「ちょうど、温まったところで」
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど」
[ショコラ]: 「美味しそうだったんです！」
[嘉祥]: 「そうか」
やむにやまれぬことも、深くもない理由だった。
[ココナツ]: 「ごめんなさい。ぼくが食べたいって言ったから」
[ココナツ]: 「ショコラは我慢してたんだけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「ココナツは温泉まんじゅうを１つくらい食べても、夕飯を残さないだろうしな」
[ココナツ]: 「あ、うん」
[ココナツ]: 「実は、もう１０個目なんだけど……」
おいおい……
しかし、叱るようなことでもないか……
[嘉祥]: 「そんなに美味しいのか？」
[ココナツ]: 「え？　あ、うん！　すっごく！」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Uh-huh?」
[Chocola]: 「They were warmed up just right...」
[Kashou]: 「Right.」
[Chocola]: 「And they looked delicious!」
[Kashou]: 「I see.」
It's neither a deep nor compelling reason at all.
[Coconut]: 「I'm sorry. It's because I said I wanted to have some.」
[Coconut]: 「Chocola tried her best to contain herself, but...」
[Kashou]: 「I assume that one tiny little hot-spring manju probably wouldn't spoil your appetite for dinner, Coconut.」
[Coconut]: 「Oh, yeah.」
[Coconut]: 「Truth is, I've already had ten...」
For crying out loud, girl...
Still, this probably isn't worth scolding them over...
[Kashou]: 「Are they really that good?」
[Coconut]: 「Huh? Oh, yeah! Really good!」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Umu"

Shokora: "Choudo, atatamatta tokoro de."

Kashou: "Naruhodo"

Shokora: "Oishisou dattan desu!"

Kashou: "Sou ka"

Yamu ni yamarenu koto mo, fukaku mo nai riyuu datta.

Coconut: "Gomen nasai. Boku ga tabetai tte itta kara."

Coconut: "Shokora wa gaman shite ta n da kedo……"

Kashou: "Coconut wa onsen manjuu o hitotsu kurai tabete mo, yuushoku o nokosanai darou shinai."

Coconut: "A, un."

Coconut: "Jitsuwa, mou juu kyuu-bu me n da kedo……"

Oi oi……

Shikashi, shikaru you na koto demo nakai ka……

Kashou: "Sonna ni oishii no ka?"

Coconut: "E? A, un! Sugoku!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Well then, let's try one."

He bought a hot manju from the street vendor. It was freshly made and piping hot.

Biting into it, he found it fluffy and moister than expected. The bean paste crumbled on his tongue, spreading sweetness.

Kashou: "Hmm... huff huff... This is delicious."

Neither the Western pastries he makes nor the traditional sweets from his family home are served warm. Eating a piping hot manju while making huffing sounds was an interesting experience.

Kashou: "Speaking of which, I've been to this hot spring town several times before, but I never tried one..."

Back then, there weren't any cats around. Even when my parents and Shigure and I went on trips together, we never talked about buying snacks like this.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Hey, you were here all along, Shigure. Did you have something to do?"

Shigure: "No, I'm fine now."

Kashou: "Was it a work call for you too, Shigure?"

Shigure: "...Uh, yes. Sorry. Especially during our trip."

Kashou: "There's no need to apologize. Soleil is closed today, but the world outside is just another weekday."

I haven't asked in detail, but it seems Shigure runs a company.

With that income, she buys clothes for the cats and pays for bell carriers' exams. Her father is strict with me, but he lets Shigure do as she pleases. It seems like he allows her to handle both the cats and the business freely.

Kashou: "The cats were enjoying themselves in their own ways—table tennis, games... even shopping at the store."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それはよかったです。……兄様、たまには兄妹水入らずで遊びませんか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いいけど、何する？」
[時雨]: 「カラオケルームがあるそうですよ？」
[嘉祥]: 「カラオケか……高校時代に、ちょっと行ったきりだな。時雨、歌えるのか？」
[時雨]: 「幼少期に合唱をやっていましたから、少しは」
そういうことになった。
[時雨]: 「それでは、兄様への想いを込めて……」
歌いはじめると、雰囲気が一変した。
[時雨]: 「～～～♪」
[嘉祥]: 「……すごい」
[時雨]: 「はぁ～、ひさしぶりに大きな声を出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「めちゃくちゃ上手いじゃないか！」
はっきり言って、プロ並だった。俺は惜しみない拍手を送る。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am glad to hear that... Nii-sama, how about we both enjoy ourselves—just us, as brother and sister?」
[Kashou]: 「Sure, but what did you have in mind?」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "That's good to hear. ... Master, how about we spend some time together as siblings?"

Kashou: "Sure, but what do we do?"

Shigure: "I heard there's a karaoke room here."

Kashou: "Karaoke, huh... I went once in high school and that was it. Shigure, can you sing?"

Shigure: "I did choir when I was young, so I can manage a little bit."

So they decided to do that.

Shigure: "Then, with all my feelings for you, Master..."

As she began singing, the atmosphere changed completely.

Shigure: "～～～♪"

Kashou: "....Amazing."

Shigure: "Ah, it's been a while since I sang so loudly."

Kashou: "You're incredibly talented!"

To be honest, her skill was on par with a professional. I gave her enthusiastic applause.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「そんなに兄様に褒めていただけるなんて……幸福の極みです」
[時雨]: 「私の歌が、兄様に喜んでいただけるなんて……この声が……兄様の記憶に……はぁ、はぁ……」
[時雨]: 「うっ……鼻血が……」
[嘉祥]: 「お、おい、大丈夫か？」
[時雨]: 「ううぅ……よろしければ、次は兄様が歌ってくださいまし」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……わ、わかった」
２人でカラオケに来て、歌わないというわけにもいかないか。抜群に上手い時雨のあとでは、つらいものがあるが……
[嘉祥]: 「えーっと……新しめの曲だと、留学してたときに覚えたやつが……」
リストを探してみる。
[嘉祥]: 「あれ？　見つからないな……ほどほどにヒット曲だと思うんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I never expected you to give me such ample praise... I am absolutely thrilled.」
[Shigure]: 「To think that my singing could delight you so much... This voice... is in your memories... Hah, hah...」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I feel a nosebleed coming on...」
[Kashou]: 「H-Hey, are you all right?」
[Shigure]: 「Unghh... If it is not too much to ask, would you sing a song next?」
[Kashou]: 「Urk... O-Okay, fine.」
The two of us are here to do some karaoke, so I very well can't NOT sing, huh? Though, going up after an excellent singer like Shigure does load on the pressure...
[Kashou]: 「Um, let's see... For newish songs, there's that one I learned back when I was studying abroad...」
I search the list.
[Kashou]: 「Huh? I can't find it... I thought it was more or less a hit song, too...」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "To be praised so much by my brother-sama... it's the pinnacle of happiness."

Shigure: "For my song to make you happy, brother-sama... this voice of mine... in your memory... ah, ah..."

Shigure: "Uh... nosebleed..."

Kashou: "Hey, are you okay?"

Shigure: "Uuuu... if it's alright, could you sing next, brother-sama?"

Kashou: "Uh... I see."

Coming to karaoke with two of us, we can't just not sing. It's tough after Shigure, who is exceptionally good...

Kashou: "Eh-eh... a relatively new song would be one from when I was studying abroad..."

He searches through the list.

Kashou: "Huh? Can't find it... I thought it was a moderately popular hit..."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「うん。メロディが綺麗なんだよ」

[嘉祥]: 「ああ、そうか！」
結局、高校時代に流行っていた曲をうろ覚えで歌った。
[時雨]: 「兄様の歌声、とっても素敵でした」
[一同]: 「いただきますにゃ！いただきますいただきます！いただきますいただきます～！いただきまーす！いただきます」

reference_answer:

[Shigure]: 「Unless it is a song that has international fame, I do not believe they would have a foreign song in their database.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, you don't say!」
In the end, I sing a song that was popular back in my high school days, faintly remembering the lyrics.
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, your singing was exquisite.」
[Everyone]: 「Time fur eating!Time to eat.Let's chow down!Time to eat.Let's dig in~!Food time!Yes, let us partake.」
[Chocola]: 「This is a regular feast, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, looks good.」
[Coconut]: 「Fwah, the sashimi is so good!」

Shigure: "Unless it's a world-famous song, I suppose there are no foreign songs included?"

Kashou: "Ah, that's right!"

In the end, he sang a song from high school that was popular at the time but only remembered vaguely.

Shigure: "Master's singing voice was very lovely."

All together: "Itadakimasu nya! Itadakimasu itadakimasu! Itadakimasu itadakimasu~! Itadakima-ssu! Itadakimasu!"

Chocola: "This is a feast, Master!"

Kashou: "Ah, it looks delicious."

Coconut: "Faa, the sashimi is yummy!"

metadata:

Question:
[時雨]: 「フカヒレの煮物ですね」
[メイプル]: 「ああ、これが」
[シナモン]: 「ふかひれって～？」
[メイプル]: 「サメの鰭のことよ」
[シナモン]: 「サメ～！？」
[ショコラ]: 「ふぁ～、いい香り！　ご主人さま、これ何でしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「えっと……松茸の茶碗蒸しだな。入っている白身は……ノドグロかな？」
[メイプル]: 「ニオイだけでわかったの！？　このお品書きを見たのではなくて……？」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、お品書きは、そこにあったのか」
[嘉祥]: 「こういう料理は、香りでわかりやすいよ。ソースやケチャップがたっぷりかかってるようなメニューは難しいけどな」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That would be simmered shark fin.」
[Maple]: 「Aah, this is?」
[Cinnamon]: 「What's a 'shark fin'~?」
[Maple]: 「That pointy thing on a shark's back.」
[Cinnamon]: 「On a shark's back~?!」
[Chocola]: 「Fwah~ Such a great aroma! Master, what is this?」
[Kashou]: 「Um, let's see... That's a matsutake mushroom chawanmushi. It's a savory egg custard, and it's filled with... blackthroat fish, I think?」
[Maple]: 「You can tell just from the smell? You didn't look at the menu here...?」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, there was a menu?」
[Kashou]: 「With this kind of cuisine, it's easy to tell by the aroma. It's harder to do that with a menu consisting of stuff covered in sauce or ketchup, though.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "Fukahire no nimono, isn't it?"

Maple: "Ah, this is..."

Cinnamon: "Fukahire...?"

[Kashou]: 「Graduating and taking over the family business with no other options on the table wasn't satisfactory to me in the least. I wanted to broaden my horizons.」

[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.

Kashou: "Getting lost in thought isn't an excuse during work, though."

Fraise: "Then I'll do my part to make up for it."

Kashou: "What should I say..."

Feeling guilty and embarrassed. Of course, gratitude is what's most important.

We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...

Emotionally, things have become a lot easier, but...

[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ You only left a letter behind, which made Mom upset, right~?」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. She just ran off out of the blue without discussing it at all; it worried me sick.」
[Shigure]: 「I apologize for that...」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh well, it seems that you were with Kashou anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, which was a surprise to me, too.」
[Awayuki]: 「The financier you gave me as a souvenir was delicious, so you're forgiven♪」
My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "By the way, did you get Shigure's sudden trip to France forgiven properly?"

Shigure: "Ugh..."

Cinnamon: "Oh yeah, it was just a note left behind, so Mom was mad about that, right?"

Awayuki: "Yeah. She went without even consulting us and suddenly disappeared, so we were worried."

Shigure: "I'm sorry..."

Awayuki: "But well, since Kashou was with her, I guess..."

Kashou: "I was surprised too."

Awayuki: "I forgave her because the financiers she brought back as a souvenir were delicious♪"

Mom is the type to get mad quietly like the depth of the sea, but she'll forgive almost anything if it involves good food.

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
SHIGURE: "Wow, is this a Christmas present!? Thank you, Mother!"

AWAYUKI: "It might be a bit early, but Kashou could get mad and leave again, right?"

SHIGURE: "Ugh..."

KASHOU: "That's not going to happen today! Trust me."

AWAYUKI: "Yes, trust Kashou too."

KASHOU: "Ah, yeah... Thank you."

AWAYUKI: "Open it and see?"

Following her instructions, he removed the wrapping paper and opened the small box.

KASHOU: "...A photo frame?"

It doesn't seem to have a picture in it.

AWAYUKI: "How about putting up this year's favorite memory in your room? I think you'll enjoy it."

Now that she mentioned it, I remembered Shigure gave one as a birthday present because Mother wanted one.

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまの！　あ、でも、どの写真が……うーん……」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、ソレイユ開店記念のときの写真にする。　ご主人さまとバニラと３人で撮ったやつ！」
[バニラ]: 「いいね。グッドチョイス。私も、そうする」
[メイプル]: 「あたしは、どうしようかしら？」
[シナモン]: 「アレがいいんじゃない～？　船で一緒に歌ったときの」
[シナモン]: 「動画だけじゃなく、写真も撮ってもらってたよね～？」
[メイプル]: 「あー。」
[メイプル]: 「……そうね。　ちょっと恥ずかしい気もするけれど」
[メイプル]: 「あれが、この１年で私にとって、一番大切な想い出だわ」

[メイプル]: 「え？　自分だけ写ってる写真なんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「One of Master! Oh, but, which one? Hmm...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, I'll put in the photo to commemorate the opening of La Soleil. The one with you, Master, and Chocola!」
[Vanilla]: 「Nice. Good choice. I'll do the same.」
[Maple]: 「What should I go with?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Why not that one~? You know, the one of us singing on the boat together.」
[Cinnamon]: 「They didn't just take videos; there's photos from then, too, right~?」
[Maple]: 「Aah, yeah.」
[Maple]: 「...Right. I feel like that'd be kind of embarrassing.」
[Maple]: 「But that is the most precious memory of the year to me.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm going to be in... May-chan's most precious memory... Hah, hah... Uhhh...」
[Maple]: 「Huh? I'm picking one with just me in it, though...」
ModelAnswer:
